img.span: Under order by the Governor of the State of New York regarding the suspension of all classroom and extra-curricular functions regarding COVID-19, Finn Academy will be closed for students beginning Tuesday, March 17 through May 15. It is important to note that Finn Academy will ensure continuity of food services throughout this suspension.
